coldSandwiches.name: BLT

coldSandwiches.name: Club
coldSandwiches.description: Our Roast Chick*n Pieces and cripsy Bac*n Strips served with lettuce, tomato and garlic mayo on slice sourdough.

coldSandwiches.name: Chick*n & Stuffing
coldSandwiches.description: Our Roast Chick*n Pieces and stuffing served with crispy iceberg lettuce and garlic mayo on sliced sourdough.

hotSandwiches.name: Bac*n & Cheeze
hotSandwiches.description: Our homemade Bac*n Strips toasted with our delicious Cheeze and American mustard.

hotSandwiches.name: Reuben
hotSandwiches.description: Sliced sourdough with Pastr*mi, sauerkraut, melted cheeze and Russian dressing.

hotSandwiches.name: Pesto, Chick*n & Cheeze
hotSandwiches.description: Our Roast Chick*n Pieces toasted with our delicious Cheeze and vegan pesto.

desserts.name: Hot Cocoa!
desserts.description: Chocolate cake with a swirl of whipped topping and a roasted marshmallow on top. Tastes like comfort!

desserts.name: NannyCakes!
desserts.description: Chocolate on the bottom, banana cake center, and topped with strawberry flavored frosting

desserts.name: Cinnamon Swirl
desserts.description: Golden vanilla cupcake with a swirl of sugary cinnamon throughout the batter and topped with a cinnamon frosting

drinks.name: Hot Buttered Rum
drinks.description: Perfect for winter, with hot buttered rum batter and topped with a hint of grated nutmeg

drinks.name: Planter's Punch
drinks.description: Mixed with various fruit and fruit juices; a fruity umbrella drink

drinks.name: Hurricane
drinks.description: Classic New Orleans cocktail with lime juice and passion fruit syrup served on ice
